00021 #ifndef TRIQS_ARRAYS_H5_STACK_H
00022 #define TRIQS_ARRAYS_H5_STACK_H
00023 #include "../array.hpp"
00024 #include <triqs/h5.hpp>
00025 #include "./simple_read_write.hpp"
00026 
00027 namespace triqs {
00028 namespace arrays {
00029 
00031  template <typename T, int R> class array_stack_impl {
00032   static const size_t dim = R;
00033   static const bool base_is_array = dim > 0;
00034   size_t bufsize_, step, _size;
00035   static const bool T_is_complex = triqs::is_complex<T>::value;
00036   static const unsigned int RANK = dim + 1 + (T_is_complex ? 1 : 0);
00037   utility::mini_vector<hsize_t, RANK> dims, offset, maxdims, dim_chunk, buffer_dim, zero;
00038   H5::DataSet dataset;
00039   array<T, dim + 1> buffer;
00040 
00041   public:
00042   array_stack_impl(h5::group g, std::string const &name, mini_vector<size_t, dim> const &base_element_shape, size_t bufsize) {
00043    mini_vector<hsize_t, RANK> dim_chunk;
00044    bufsize_ = bufsize;
00045    step = 0;
00046    _size = 0;
00047    for (size_t i = 1; i <= dim; ++i) {
00048     dims[i] = base_element_shape[i - 1];
00049    }
00050    if (T_is_complex) {
00051     dims[RANK - 1] = 2;
00052    }
00053    maxdims = dims;
00054    buffer_dim = dims;
00055    dim_chunk = dims;
00056    dims[0] = 0;
00057    maxdims[0] = H5S_UNLIMITED;
00058    dim_chunk[0] = 1;
00059    buffer_dim[0] = bufsize_;
00060    mini_vector<size_t, dim + 1> s;
00061    for (size_t i = 0; i <= dim; ++i) {
00062     s[i] = buffer_dim[i];
00063    }
00064    buffer.resize(s);
00065    H5::DataSpace mspace1(RANK, dims.ptr(), maxdims.ptr());
00066    H5::DSetCreatPropList cparms;
00067    cparms.setChunk(RANK, dim_chunk.ptr()); // Modify dataset creation properties, i.e. enable chunking.
00068    try {
00069     dataset = g.create_dataset(name, h5::native_type_from_C(typename h5::remove_complex<T>::type()), mspace1, cparms);
00070     if (triqs::is_complex<T>::value) h5::write_string_attribute(&dataset, "__complex__", "1");
00071    }
00072    TRIQS_ARRAYS_H5_CATCH_EXCEPTION;
00073   }
00074 
00076   ~array_stack_impl() { flush(); }
00077 
00078 #ifdef TRIQS_DOXYGEN
00079 
00080   auto operator()() { return buffer(step, ellipsis()); }
00081 
00083   auto operator()() const { return buffer(step, ellipsis()); }
00084 #else
00085   auto operator()() DECL_AND_RETURN(buffer(step, ellipsis()));
00086   auto operator()() const DECL_AND_RETURN(buffer(step, ellipsis()));
00087 #endif
00088 
00090   void operator++() {
00091    ++step;
00092    ++_size;
00093    if (step == bufsize_) flush();
00094   }
00095 
00097   void flush() {
00098    save_buffer();
00099    step = 0;
00100   }
00101 
00106   template <class AType> void operator<<(AType const &A) {
00107    (*this)() = A;
00108    ++(*this);
00109   }
00110 
00112   size_t size() const { return _size; }
00113 
00114   private:
00115   void save_buffer() {
00116    if (step == 0) return;
00117    dims[0] += step;
00118    buffer_dim[0] = step;
00119    dataset.extend(dims.ptr());
00120    H5::DataSpace fspace1 = dataset.getSpace(), mspace = h5_impl::data_space(buffer);
00121    fspace1.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, buffer_dim.ptr(), offset.ptr());
00122    mspace.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, buffer_dim.ptr(), zero.ptr());
00123    try {
00124     dataset.write(h5_impl::__get_array_data_ptr(buffer), h5::data_type_memory<T>(), mspace, fspace1);
00125    }
00126    TRIQS_ARRAYS_H5_CATCH_EXCEPTION;
00127    offset[0] += step;
00128   }
00129  };
00130 
00131  // ------------------------- User classes ------------------------------
00132  
00133  // The simple case, 1d
00134  template <typename T> class array_stack : public array_stack_impl<T, 0> {
00135   static_assert((is_scalar<T>::value), "Only available for a scalar type");
00136   public:
00144   array_stack(h5::group g, std::string const &name, size_t bufsize)
00145      : array_stack_impl<T, 0>{g, name, mini_vector<size_t, 0>{}, bufsize} {}
00146  };
00147 
00148  // Specialisation for The simple case, 1d
00149  template <typename T, int N> class array_stack<array<T, N>> : public array_stack_impl<T, N> {
00150   public:
00159   array_stack(h5::group g, std::string const &name, mini_vector<size_t,N> const &base_element_shape, size_t bufsize)
00160      : array_stack_impl<T, N>{g, name, base_element_shape, bufsize} {}
00161  };
00162 }
00163 } // namespace
00164 #endif
